casebody.data:
Troy Lee CURTIS, petitioner,
v.
Anthony MACKEY, Judge, Court of Appeals of Arizona, Division One, et al. Kenneth E. Shatzer, petitioner,
v.
Anthony Mackey, Judge, Court of Appeals of Arizona, Division One, et al.; and David Levy Greenberg, petitioner,
v.
Anthony Mackey, Judge, Court of Appeals of Arizona, Division One, et al. No. 17-5962. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 13, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Arizona denied.
